config.question: Herbert Spencer developed the theory of __________.

answer_3.response: Stress on the slow pace of change reflected the doctrine of social Darwinism, which argued against the usefulness of reform, and was based on the writings of the English philosopher Herbert Spencer. In influential books, Spencer applied Charles Darwin’s principles of natural selection to society.
